text: The 2004 Tour de Hongrie was the 31st edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 26 July to 1 August 2004. The race started in Veszprém and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Zoltán Remák. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Podbrezová | style="text- align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Cyclingnews.com | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 06" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Podbrezová | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 23" |} |} ==References== 2004 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
